entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `author_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `conversation_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `in_reply_to_user_id` TEXT, `text` TEXT NOT NULL, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `device_created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

indices.name: index_Tweet_conversation_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Tweet_conversation_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`conversation_id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `username` TEXT NOT NULL, `profile_image_url` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT
      T.conversation_id conversationId, T.text conversationPreviewText, 
      T.created_at conversationStartedAt,
      
      U.name userFullName, U.username username,
      U.profile_image_url userProfileImage,
      
      ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Tweet WHERE conversation_id = T.conversation_id ) numberOfTweetsInConversation
    FROM Tweet T
    INNER JOIN User U ON U.id = T.author_id
    GROUP BY conversation_id HAVING MIN(created_at)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
